name: learning-and-engagement-tool
description: CSC2033-Software Engineering Team Project, Team 54, EPiC Learning and Engagement Tool

scripts.backend: docker exec -it web npm run start
scripts.killall: docker exec -it web npm run stop-all
scripts.frontend: docker exec -it web npm run webpack
scripts.frontend:livereload: docker exec -it web npm run livereload

author: Erikas Nakonecnikovas, Danila Grobov, Jake Hobbs, Max Champagne, Sofia Trevino
